Name: LU 341 - Zoning, East New York Rezoning, Brooklyn (C160035ZMK)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 160035  ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 341).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC

A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.
